labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: User gets notified for the role mention, but the message is not yellow
data.short_description: Notification for role mention when user is not in role
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on a *large* server (like discord-developers with a moderator ping) - Change *Notification Settings* to notify on *All Messages* - Get someone to mention a role that you are not in.
